document.full_text: samsung electronics co, the world's no.2 handset maker, launched a new version of its flagship smartphone galaxy s in south korea ahead of its global debut in may, targeting global sales of over 10 million this year.
document.title: samsung launches galaxy s sequel
lines_and_colors: samsung electronics co, the world's no.2 handset maker, launched a new version of its flagship smartphone galaxy s in south korea ahead of its global debut in may, targeting global sales of over 10 million this year.
